PHRASE.LANG: The jeans you were wearing when you washed ashore. They are torn and ripped. [#Legal]
Le jean que vous portiez lorsque vous vous êtes échouée. Il est complètement déchiré. [#Legal]
I jeans che indossavi durante il naufragio. Sono strappati e bucati. [#Legal]
Los vaqueros que llevabas al llegar a la costa. Están hechos jirones. [#Legal]
流れ着いた際に身に着けていたジーンズ。ボロボロに破れてしまっている。 [#Legal]
물에 떠내려 왔을 때 입고 있었던 진즈. 너덜너덜하게 찢어지고 말았다. [#Legal]
The jeans you were wearing when you washed ashore. They are torn and ripped. [#Legal]
漂流過後穿在身上的牛仔褲，破爛不堪。[#Legal]
漂流過後穿在身上的牛仔褲，破爛不堪。[#Legal]
The jeans you were wearing when you washed ashore. They are torn and ripped. [#Legal]
